page.title: 06Heolgerrig Notable Events
page.content: In 1987 the National Urdd Eisteddfod is coming to Merthyr Tydfil.For the Eisteddfod to be able to come to Merthyr Tydfil the towns- people have got to raise one hundred thousand pounds. Each area of the town has its own committee which organises fund-raising schemes. These committees are called area committees. The Heolgerrig committee has raised over one thousand pounds already.They have raised this by raffles, parties, concerts, plays and fetes. On June 8th there is a childrens day at Heolgerrig Primary School it starts at 2p.m. OnJune 11th there is a concert at Salem Chapel.Dowlais Male Choir and other artists will be appearing there. Mrs. Thomas, the nursery teacher at our school has organised these events.
